title: The long dark 1.24
description:
The Long Dark is a thoughtful, exploration focused survival simulation set in the Northern wilderness in the aftermath of a global disaster. Brave the elements and other survivors, hunt for supplies, explore the world, uncover the mystery, answer the question: How far will you go to survive?

Deep survival simulation gameplay where every decision matters. Explore a large open world in search of resources, and balance Conditions such as Hypothermia, Starvation, Dehydration, and a bevy of afflictions and injuries that can take you down, from Blood Loss to Dysentery.

Morally challenging scenarios that push players to answer the question: Ã¢â‚¬Å“How far will you go to survive?Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½. Any survivor you meet in the world can be friend or foe. Will you risk your life to discover what they know and selflessly sacrifice for the common good, or liveÃ¢â‚¬â€and potentially dieÃ¢â‚¬â€by the adage, Ã¢â‚¬Å“might makes rightÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½?

Experience dozens of hours of free-form Survival Sandbox gameplay. Push yourself and your skill to survive as long as possible in a variety of survival scenarios, across a large open world. Balance your resources against the threats posed by mother nature, and by other AI survivors you meet along the way.

Rich episodic fiction featuring dozens of locations, a cast of memorable characters, and a mature post-disaster storyline inspired by the creative risk-taking seen in many of todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exciting television series. This isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t the end of the world, but you can see it from here.

Game version: 1.24 (alpha)

This update should address general game performance, particularly on high-end systems. 

Change list:

- Fix key bindings crash when user did not have a profile 
- Framerate improvements, especially for high end PCs 
- Display correct bindings during wolf struggle 
- Fix problem with binding Inventory to *Enter*
- Removed Help from pause menu 

Install notes:

No need to install, just copy the game folder to a desired location and play.

Please keep seeding the game and enjoy playing it. Have in mind it's an alpha. If you like it, please considering buying it to support the developers.
